plugin.name: CogniCrypt
plugin.description: <em>CogniCrypt<em> is an IntelliJ IDEA and Android Studio plugin that supports Java developers in using cryptographic APIs.
plugin.change-notes:
• Added Support for IntelliJ 2020.2 and Android Studio 4
  • Updated CrySL rules for JCA library to 1.5.1

If you are updating from a previous version you might need to change the CrySL rules path in Settings!A valid path should look like this:%USERPROFILE%\.AndroidStudio4.0\config\plugins\icognicrypt\lib\CrySLRules\JavaCryptographicArchitecture
